column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column7: me gya afɔr edziban a oyi nka huanhuam ma me no
column8: hom ndwen do mfa mbrɛ me wɔ ne ber mu."

column2: "Na se hɔn dɛ
column3: Ogya afɔr a hom mfa mbrɛ EWURADZE nye yi; nguambaanyin a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm
column4: na wɔmfa ebien da kor mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr daa."

column2: "Eguambaa kor na fa bɔ afɔr anapa na eguambaa kor so fa bɔ afɔr ewimbir;"
"na fa isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu kor yɛ edziban afɔr a wɔdze ngo a woesiw  hin   ebupɛn anan mu kor afrɔw."
"Ɔyɛ daa afɔr a wɔhyehyɛe wɔ bepɔw Sinai do a oyi nka huanhuam a ɔyɛ ogya afɔr ma EWURADZE."
"Na no nom afɔr wɔ eguambaa kor ho nyɛ  hin   ebupɛn anan mu kor: na bea krɔnkrɔn no do na hue ɔnom afɔr nsadzen no ma EWURADZE."
"Na eguambaa kor no so fa bɔ afɔr ewimbir no: dɛ mbrɛ anapa edziban afɔr no tse
column3: na mbrɛ no nom afɔr no tse no
column4: na fa bɔ ne gya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na ahomgyeda no nguambaanyin ebien a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm
column3: nye edziban afɔr isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu ebien a wɔdze ngo afrɔw nye no nom afɔr:"

column2: "iyi nye ahomgyeda biara ne hyew afɔr a ɔka daa ɔhyew afɔr
column3: nye no nom afɔr ho."

column2: "Na hom abosoom ahyɛse no hom mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr mma EWURADZE; anantwisaa mburwa ebien
column3: nye oguannyin kor
column4: nguambaanyin esuon a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm;"

column2: "na edziban afɔr isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu ebiasa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw
column3: nka ɔnantwisaa kor ho; na edziban afɔr isiam pa ebupɛn du mu ebien a wɔdze ngo afrɔw nka oguannyin kor no ho;"

column2: "na edziban afɔr isiam pa ebupɛn du mu nkorkor a wɔdze ngo afrɔw
column3: nka eguambaa biara ho; nyɛ ɔhyew afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam

column2: "Na no nom afɔr nyɛ wenyin  hin   ɔfa nka ɔnantwisaa kor ho
column3: na  hin   ebupɛn ebiasa mu kor nka oguannyin no ho
column4: na  hin   ebupɛn anan mu kor nka eguambaa kor ho: iyi nye bosoom biara ne hyew afɔr wɔ afrenhyia abosoom no nyina mu."

column2: "Na wɔmfa apɔnkyenyin kor mbɔ bɔn ho afɔr mma EWURADZE; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr no
column3: nye no nom afɔr no ho."

column2: "Na bosoom a odzi kan no mu
column3: bosoom no ne da a otsia duanan no

column2: "Na bosoom no ara ne da a otsia duenum no
column3: nyɛ afahyɛ da: nda esuon na wondzi epitsi boodoo."

column2: "Da a odzi kan no nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; mma mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara:"
"mbom hom mbɔ ogya afɔr
column3: ɔhyew afɔr mma EWURADZE; anantwisaa mburwa ebien
column5: nye nguambaanyin esuon a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia: wɔnyɛ dza wonndzii dzɛm mma hom:"

column2: "nye n'edziban afɔr
column3: isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw: ebupɛn du mu ebiasa na hom mfa nka ɔnantwisaa kor ho
column4: na ebupɛn du mu ebien nka oguannyin no ho mbra;"

column2: "ebupɛn du mu nkorkor na fa ka nguambaa esuon no mu eguambaa biara ho bra;"
"na bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor
column3: ma wɔmfa mpata mma hom."

column2: "Hom nyɛ iyinom nka anapa ɔhyew afɔr a ɔyɛ daa ɔhyew afɔr no ho."
"Dɛm yi ara na hom nyɛ ogya afɔr edziban a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE no
column3: daa daa
column4: nda esuon: wɔnyɛ nka daa ɔhyew afɔr no
column5: na no nom afɔr no ho."

column2: "Na da a otsia esuon no hom nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara."
"Eso nduadzewakan da no mu
column3: sɛ hom dze edziban fofor afɔr rebrɛ EWURADZE wɔ hom adapɛn afahyɛ mu a
column4: hom nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara:"

column2: "mbom hom mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE; anantwisaa mburwa ebien
column3: oguannyin kor
column4: nguambaanyin esuon a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia;"

column2: "na n'edziban afɔr
column3: isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw
column4: ebupɛn du mu ebiasa nka ɔnantwisaa kor ho
column5: ebupɛn du mu ebien nka oguannyin kor no ho
column7: "ebupɛn du mu nkorkor nka eguambaa esuon no mu eguambaa biara ho;"

column2: "apɔnkyenyin kor
column3: ma wɔmfa mpata mma hom."

column2: "Hom nyɛ mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr no
column3: nye n'edziban afɔr no
column4: nye no nom afɔr no ho."
